isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR WINDOW REGULATOR ARM ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR WINDOW REGULATOR ARM ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Window Regulator Arm Assembly on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 213 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Position window regulator arm (Item 1) in behind the modular door hardware assembly (Item 2), line up the hole in the window regulator arm with the hole in the modular door hardware assembly. Install window regulator arm assembly shaft (Item 3) through the modular door hardware assembly into the window regulator arm. Using a flat blade screw driver (Item 4) in the slot of the window regulator arm assembly shaft, rotate it clockwise to lock it in the window regulator arm, driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 213. Window Regulator Arm and Window Regulator Arm Assembly Shaft

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 83 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2) into slot of window regulator arm assembly shaft (Item 5), driver side shown.

warning.para: To avoid personal injury, be sure to use an appropriate tool and use care when installing the window regulator assembly coil spring behind the retaining tab on the modular door hardware assembly per Step 3, since the window regulator assembly coil spring will be loaded during installation.

step1.para: Once the window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2) is installed properly on the window regulator arm assembly shaft (Item 5). Using an appropriate tool, rotate window regulator assembly coil spring clockwise around to the retaining tab (Item 3) on the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and position behind retaining tab, driver side shown.
Rotate inner cab door handle (Item 1) back down over the window regulator assembly coil spring (Item 2), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 82 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position both retaining tabs (Item 3) on the inner cab door handle (Item 2) into the slots in the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) and slide inner cab door handle to the left to secure retaining tabs in place, driver side shown.

Once the inner cab door handle (Item 2) is positioned properly. Install torx head bolt (Item 1) securing inner cab door handle to the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4), driver side shown. Tighten to 71 to 88.5 Lbf-in (8 to 10 N•m).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 61 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Lower cab door glass (Item 4) to the bottom of front cab door (Item 3).

Working through the cab door access opening (Item 8), carefully push window regulator arm (Item 10) into the cab door window slide block (Item 11) in the cab door window slide rail (Item 12), driver side shown.

If vehicle is equipped with manual door window, temporarily place the window regulator handle (Item 6) on the window regulator handle shaft (Item 7) and raise and lower cab door glass (Item 4) in the front cab door (Item 3). Make sure cab door glass goes up and down smoothly without binding before continuing. Once it is determined the cab door glass goes up and down properly, remove window regulator handle and continue to next step, driver side shown.

If vehicle is equipped with electric door window, temporarily hold front cab door trim panel (Item 1) up to the front cab door (Item 3) and connect electric connectors (Item 3, Figure 55) and use electric window switch panel (Item 5) to raise and lower cab door glass (Item 4) in the front cab door. Make sure cab door glass goes up and down smoothly without binding before continuing. Once it is determined the cab door glass goes up and down properly, disconnect electric connector to front cab door trim panel and continue to next step, driver side shown.

Install front cab door window electric motor, refer to
CAB DOOR WINDOW ELECTRIC MOTOR
. For installing front cab door window electric motor, refer to Install Front Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install front cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door window regulator arm and window regulator arm assembly shaft.

Working through the cab door access opening (Item 8), carefully push window regulator arm (Item 10) into the cab door window slide block (Item 11) in the cab door window slide rail (Item 12), driver side shown.

Install rear cab door window electric motor, refer to
CAB DOOR WINDOW ELECTRIC MOTOR
. For installing rear cab door window electric motor, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
.

Install rear cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side rear cab door window regulator arm and window regulator arm assembly shaft.
